about_the_game:
BeDo is a unique platformer—there isn't even a jump button, to begin with—and it feels refreshingly simple at its core: move a mysterious dough through the universe. How well can you control your spatial slides? Can you lead BeDo to the goal in every level?

Alongside hypnotic pixel art graphics and a dazzlingly atmospheric soundtrack, BeDo offers an immersive, fun and challenging experience. It's both accessible and tough. Everyone can start and progress in the adventure, but exploring every corner of the universe won't be an easy task.

Traverse galactic phases and find the Dough scattered throughout the universe.
You are in a universe at risk, and we need precision. Either way, you can relax exploring mysterious galaxies… or dashing quickly to the golden goal!

Features

- Control BeDo as an extension of your finger: lead him in all directions as you float through space
- More than 40 handcrafted colorful levels teeming with collectibles
- Dodge Evil: Skill and precision are paramount to sort and avoid obstacles, enemies and traps in your path
- Collect Dough of Vital Creation that was scattered throughout the Universe
- Discover secret areas and unlock valuable secrets
- A galactic, nostalgic and intriguing soundtrack
- Discover the Mother Dough and defeat the Slumber
